hero.title: ALTIUS

hero.description: Our club is a place where everyone can find their path to success.

hero.title: Professional Badminton Club
hero.subtitle: We have been developing badminton in Moldova since 2010
hero.description: Our mission is to make badminton accessible to everyone and help each player reach their potential

values.title: Our Values
values.subtitle: What makes us special
values.professionalismDesc: High-quality training with certified coaches and modern equipment
values.friendlinessDesc: Welcoming environment for players of all ages and skill levels
values.resultsDesc: Individual approach to each student to achieve maximum progress

team.title: Our Team
team.subtitle: Meet our professional coaches
team.founderDesc1: Alexey founded ALTIUS in 2010 with the vision to develop badminton in Moldova. His professional approach and dedication have helped hundreds of students achieve their goals.
team.founderDesc2: Under his leadership, the club has become one of Chisinau's leading training centers, known for high-quality coaching and a friendly atmosphere.
team.founderQuote: Every student is unique. Our goal is to help everyone reach their full potential in badminton.

0.name: Elena Petrova
0.description: Specializes in beginners and developing proper stroke technique.

1.name: Dmitry Kozlov
1.description: Responsible for physical conditioning and injury prevention.

2.name: Anna Smirnova
2.description: Focuses on training children 6–16 with a fun and engaging atmosphere.

history.title: Our History
history.subtitle: The path from idea to leading badminton club

q1.title: Altius Launch
q1.text: Opened our doors and held the first intakes for adults and teens.

q2.title: Core team formation
q2.text: Stabilized the schedule, formed the first club group and started the base rating.

q3.title: First trophies
q3.text: Club members won prizes at local tournaments.

q4.title: Season summary
q4.text: Held the club year final and awarded the best players and coaches.

q1.title: Junior school
q1.text: Launched kids groups, test camps and individual programs.

q2.title: Club league
q2.text: Regular internal matches and level-based mini leagues.

q3.title: Expanding participation
q3.text: Away tournaments, partnerships and sparring with regional clubs.

q4.title: Altius Cup
q4.text: Open club tournament with guests and an award ceremony.

roadmap.title: Development Plans
roadmap.subtitle: Our goals for the coming years

q3_2025.title: Expanding participation
q3_2025.desc: Trips to tournaments, partnerships and sparring with regional clubs.

q4_2025.title: Altius Cup
q4_2025.desc: Open club tournament with a ceremony and invited guests.

q1_2026.title: U17 Academy
q1_2026.desc: Regular camps, tests, support and a competition calendar.

q2_2026.title: Club league 2.0
q2_2026.desc: Tiered divisions, ratings, match days and live streams.
